head.title: SBC SELLS LEASE RIGHTS FOR 3,900 TOWERS

hedline.hl1: SBC SELLS LEASE RIGHTS FOR 3,900 TOWERS

abstract.p: SpectraSite Holdings, which builds, manages and leases wireless communications towers in major cities, will acquire leasing rights for 3,900 towers from SBC Communications for about $1.3 billion (S)

block.p: SpectraSite Holdings, a company that builds, manages and leases wireless communications towers in major cities across the nation, agreed to acquire the leasing rights for 3,900 towers from SBC Communications for roughly $1.3 billion. SpectraSite, which is based in Cary, N.C., will pay $983 million in cash and $325 million in stock to manage the towers for 27 years. The company also agreed to build about 800 new towers for SBC of San Antonio.
